column2: an A.M. Eatery////Perfect was the presentation and taste of their Benny Duo: 1) Bella! Bella! Benny: sliced cooked prosciutto
column6: drizzle of balsamic glaze and arugula at the side; and
column7: 2) Chili Verde Benny:  fantastic pulled pork over stack of green chile sauced tortillas which felt like a tamale
column9: with a mild pico de gallo!  A wonderful combination!
